page.title: 02Industry in Kirkcaldy
page.content: The{Babygro}factory employs 320 people making children's clothing and this number is rising. There are 30 male and 290 female employees. They get paid Â£2.10 an hour working Monday to Friday each week. For holidays they get 15 days in Summer, 9 days at Christmas,2 days in Spring and 2 days in the Autumn. The day starts at 0800 , lunch is from 1300 to 1330 and the day ends at 1700. To be able to work in the Babygro factory you must be good at sewing , knitting or cutting but failing that you can be an assistant in the shop attached to the factory.
